Cén aois is féidir liom?
When can you leave school? When can you drive a car?
Cén uair is féidir leat an scoil a fhágáil?
Checklist for a non-EEA national living outside Ireland who is marrying an Irish national in Ireland
Cén uair is féidir leat carr a thiomáint?
Describes the steps to be taken by a non-EEA national who is living outside Ireland and plans to marry an Irish national in Ireland
Insíonn an doiciméad seo duit cén uair is féidir leat an scoil a fhágáil, tosú ag tiomáint, agus go leor rudaí eile

Quick links to entitlements and payments for carers
Checklist for people with disabilities and long-term illness
Checklist when applying for Carer's Allowance
Checklist guide to redundancy procedures A step-by-step guide listing the procedure in a redundancy situation, your entitlements, points to check and forms to be completed if being made redundant

Before you send your application for Carer's Allowance to the Department of Social Protection this checklist will help ensure that you have filled in the form correctly and have attached all necessary documentation
Checklist of documents needed when applying for a student grant
Checklist: Appropriate basic Supplementary Welfare Allowance (SWA) rates for different personal circumstances
When applying for a student grant you have to provide certain documents to prove you are eligible
Use this checklist to help to work out the rate of Rent Supplement a person qualifies for
Checklist of things to do following a bereavement
Gluais de Théarmaí Inimirce
This checklist will help you to avoid overlooking the key items
Liosta de shaintéarmaí inimirce agus míniú gearr ar is brí leo
Checklist of where my possessions are kept
Gluais de théarmaí fostaíochta
Knowing where your personal possessions and valuable documents are kept, can be very useful
Liosta de na téarmaí a úsáidtear sa dlí fostaíochta le míniú gearr ar bhrí na dtéarmaí
Use this checklist to record where your possessions and important documents are kept
Seicliosta Gearán Nuair a cheannaíonn tú earraí nó seirbhísí in Éirinn nó i mBallstát eile an AE tá cosaint agat ó reachtaíocht tomhaltóirí
Checklist when appealing a social welfare decision
Seicliosta chun iarratas a dhéanamh ar Phinsean Stáit (Neamhranníocach)
Outlines the stages involved in an appeal
Ní mór duit doiciméid éagsúla a sholáthar nuair atá iarratas á dhéanamh agat ar Phinsean Stáit (Neamhranníocach) in Éirinn
Explains what to do at each stage of an appeal
Cuireann an seicliosta seo faisnéis ar fáil maidir leis na doiciméid a theastaíonn
Checklist when applying for Carer's Allowance
Seicliosta chun iarratas a dhéanamh ar shaoire cúramóra

Before you send your application for Carer's Allowance to the Department of Social Protection this checklist will help ensure that you have filled in the form correctly and have attached all necessary documentation
Déantar cur síos ar na nósanna imeachta éagsúla a bhíonn i gceist nuair a bhíonn tú ag cur isteach ar shaoire cúramóra
Checklist when applying for Jobseeker's Allowance
Seicliosta de nithe le déanamh ag lucht méala tar éis báis
When you apply for Jobseeker's Allowance, you are required to supply certain information
Uaireanta is deacair don lucht méala cuimhneamh ar céard atá le déanamh díreach i ndiaidh báis nó sna laethanta agus seachtainí a leanann
A checklist of items to bring with you when you apply for a Jobseeker's Allowance
Seo seicliosta gairid de roinnt de na nithe atá le déanamh tar éis báis ar fiú iad a mheabhrú
Checklist when applying for Jobseeker's Benefit
Seicliosta do dhaoine faoi mhíchumas agus ar a bhfuil galar fadtéarmach
When you apply for Jobseeker's Benefit you must supply certain information
Seicliosta do náisiúnach nach ón Limistéar Eorpach Eacnamaíoch dó, atá ina chónaí lasmuigh d’Éirinn agus atá ag pósadh náisiúnach Éireannach
This is a checklist of items to bring with you when you apply for Jobseeker's Benefit
Déantar cur síos ar na céimeanna atá le glacadh ag náisiúnach nach ón LEE dó, atá ina chónaí lasmuigh d’Éirinn agus a bhfuil rún aige náisiúnach Éireannach a phósadh in Éirinn
Checklist when applying for a State Pension (Non-Contributory)
Seicliosta na gcáipéisí a bhfuil gá leo nuair atáthar ag déanamh iarratais ar dheontas mic léinn
You are required to supply a number of documents when applying for an Irish State Pension (Non-Contributory). This checklist provides information on the documents required
Má tá tú ag déanamh iarratas ar dheontas chothabhála do mhic léinn, caithfidh tú doiciméid áirithe a sholáthar mar chruthúnas ioncaim
Checklist when applying for carer's leave
Seicliosta nuair a dhéantar siopadóireacht ar líne
Describes the different procedures involved when you are applying for carer's leave
Liosta rudaí chun cuimhneamh orthu agus tú ag déanamh siopadóireachta ar líne
Checklist when shopping online
Cur síos na céimeanna a bhaineann le hachomharc
A list of items to be aware of when you shop online
Míniú na rudaí á dhéanamh ar feadh gach céim an achomhairc
Checklist: Appropriate basic Supplementary Welfare Allowance (SWA) rates for different personal circumstances
Ní mór duit faisnéis áirithe a sholáthar chun iarratas a dhéanamh ar Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist

Seicliosta: Treoir ar nósanna imeachta iomarcaíochta
Quick links to entitlements and services for older people
Má rinneadh tú iomarcach seo treoir céim ar chéim ag liostú nós imeachta i gcás iomarcaíochta, do theidlíochtaí, pointí a sheiceáil agus foirmeacha a chomhlíonadh

A checklist providing an overview of education, employment and other options for school leavers
A checklist providing an overview of education, employment and other options for school leavers
When you buy goods or services in Ireland or another EU Member State you are protected by consumer legislation
Mearnaisc le cáipéisí áisiúla faoi fhéinfhostaíocht
If your consumer rights are not being honoured you will need to complain and sometimes it can be difficult to know what to do if something goes wrong
Seicliosta: teidlíochtaí agus tacaíochtaí do thuismitheoirí aonair Mearnaisc le cáipéisí áisiúla do thuismitheoirí aonair

A list of the terms used in employment law with a short explanation of what they mean
Mearnaisc le teidlíochtaí agus seirbhísí do dhaoine aosta
